amendment.description: To fund the procurement of HC-130J aircraft by the Coast Guard, and to provide an offset by striking National Railroad Passenger Corporation grant funding for the Northeast Corridor.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1395 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 91.

action.text: Amendment SA 1395 proposed by Senator Scott FL to Amendment SA 891. (consideration: CR S1244-1245; text: CR S1244) To fund the procurement of HC-130J aircraft by the Coast Guard, and to provide an offset by striking National Railroad Passenger Corporation grant funding for the Northeast Corridor.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1395 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 91.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1395 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 91.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1395 proposed by Senator Scott FL to Amendment SA 891.
